entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist, a dark wizard. He is mentioned as someone who might know about the Deathly Hallows, but it's unlikely because he would have sought them if he knew.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The protagonist of the story. He is mentioned as someone who has heard The Tales of Beedle the Bard, but it's not clear how this relates to the Deathly Hallows.

entities.name: the tales of beedle the bard
entities.description: A book mentioned as something that Harry has heard. It's not clear what its significance is in relation to the Deathly Hallows.

entities.name: deathly hallows
entities.description: Three objects that make the possessor master of Death. They are mentioned as something Voldemort might know about, but it's unlikely because he would have sought them if he knew.

entities.name: horcruxes
entities.description: Objects created by Voldemort to house pieces of his soul. They are mentioned as something that might not be necessary if Voldemort knew about the Deathly Hallows.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: One of the three Deathly Hallows, a powerful wand. It is mentioned as something Voldemort sought without realizing its full power.

relationships.description: It's unlikely that Voldemort knew about the Deathly Hallows because he would have sought them if he knew.
Voldemort sought the Elder Wand without realizing its full power, and it's mentioned as one of the three Deathly Hallows.
